question: What is included in your Social Media management plans?
answer:
Our plans include content creation, post scheduling, community engagement, hashtag strategy, monthly analytics reports, and dedicated account management. Higher-tier plans also include paid ad campaigns, influencer collaborations, and custom video content.
We combine transparent pricing, certified specialists, data-driven strategies, and personalized attention
